DESCRIPTION: Only one of you can be #yManifested at the same time. If you are not #yManifested, gain #b50% less #yBlock and deal #b50% less damage. Playing an #yAttack will cause you to #yManifest.
If you are #yManifested, this card also affects ALL enemies.
When a card marked with #yFortune is drawn, you and ALL enemies gain 3 #yBlock, then the mark is removed.
When a card marked with #yMisfortune is drawn, ALL enemies lose 5 HP, then the mark is removed.
ALL Block from #yFortune will be applied to whoever is #yIt. Dealing unblocked attack damage while #yIt will make the target with the most HP #yIt. Only one can be #yIt.
Enemies with #yAtrophy lose HP when you debuff them.
Enemies with #yExcess lose HP at the start of the turn, then #yExcess is removed.

This card will take effect when a #yYang card is played after it. The #yYang card's effects will replace [#eeeeee][ ][]. If the next card played is not a #yYang card or the turn is ended, this card will return to your hand and be #yRetained.

This card will take effect when a #yYin card is played before it. This card's effects will replace [#eeeeee][ ][] on the #yYin card. If the last card played is not a #yYin card, this card will return to your hand and be #yRetained.
Frozen reduces attack damage dealt by its amount. Frozen decreases by #b1 whenever the affected enemy is attacked.
Aflame increases attack damage taken by its amount. Aflame decreases by #b1 whenever the affected enemy is attacked.
An enemy that doesn't attack, and damages ALL enemies upon death.
This effect triggers if the last card played is of the specified type.
This effect triggers if the target has already been attacked this turn.
Fragments are #b0 cost Attacks that deal damage based on the total number of Fragments in combat.
